content.stimulus_en: He (see) ________ his friend at the mall.
I (make) ________ a mistake.
She (have) ________ a big breakfast.
I (go) ________ to the cinema on Friday.
They (buy) ________ a new car last month.
We (take) ________ many photos during the trip.
He saw a very interesting documentary.
I to went London for my holidays.
She bought a beautiful dress for the party.
I my found keys under the sofa.
They ate at a Japanese restaurant.
We a had great time at the concert.
